# Herald's Call (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]], [[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 113

*By placing your hand to your mouth and calling out, you gain the attention of creatures around you. For a moment, all eyes snap to you. Some creatures seem reluctant or unable to pull their eyes away.*

Any creature with 5 Hit Dice or less is slowedfor 1 round. Creatures beyond the radius of the burst might hear the shout, but they are not slowed. An affected creature under the effect of a *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]* spell has the *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]* spell suppressed (not dispelled) for 1 round.
